entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Bagotville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:15 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -31.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Bagotville 05:53 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -31.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -50
Dewpoint: -36.0°C
Wind: W 44 km/h gust 57 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Local blowing snow. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 this morning. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 51 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 27 with temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning late this evening. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 27 with temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill minus 37 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
